title: The Matrix_ Path of Neo_English_v 1.2_by_shio34
description:
The Matrix: Path of Neo Recommended Requirements

CPU:  intel core 2 duo 2,4 ghz or highter

RAM:  2 GB or more

OS:  windows vista x64 / Windwos 7sp1 x64 / Windwos 8 or 8.1 x64 / Windows 10 x64 

Video Card: 1024 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible video card nvidia geforce 9800 gt or ati radeon eqvivalent

DirectX version: 9.0c

Sound Card: integrated realtek hd audio

Free Disk Space: 6 GB 


how to run

1. dont turn off your internet connection this version requires active internet connection

2. copy  The Matrix Path of Neo_English_v 1.2 folder from iso image to your hard disc D:/games

3. this game requires i-nix analog gamepad but you can play normaly with keyboard and mouse  (if you don,t have a gamepad)

4. to play this game, run Matrix3.exe



this is 100% working version seed it!
